pull_request.title: Deleted duplicate rules in the Annoyances filter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

comment.body:
А если такое правило?
`@@||jit.si^$stealth`

Отдельно откройте этот адрес в Фоксе - `about:webrtc`
Там есть кнопка Debug. Нажмите её, потом повторите проблему, обновите вкладку с `about:webrtc` и сделайте скриншот.
Потом проделайте то же самое с выключенным Адгардом.

issue.title: eksisozluk.com, fixes search-box text ads
issue.body:
"sponsorlu" list items removal and search box placeholder ads text hiding,

tested on Firefox (Windows), Chrome (Windows), Chrome mobile mode via DevTools (Windows)

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
hides/removes search box ads on eksisozluk.com.

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?
Search box ads become hidden and removed.

### Enter the issue address

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located






1. Your comment

They put text ads into search box placeholder. My fix hides it. They add 2 list items (`<li>`) to search results. I removed them from DOM. Also there is a text "sponsorlu" (means sponsored) next to the search box. My fix hides it. 

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846855-e9a25c5c-5af2-4822-bcf4-4a88feaf2eac.PNG)


</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847520-43a5feb5-b0df-4617-b804-6dda6595d9d2.PNG)


</details>
<details>

<summary>Screenshot search results ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox2-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846864-ed6489af-48da-4793-9666-215187434696.PNG)

</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot search results ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox2-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847538-1e96cf3d-7a5f-4a3f-8861-266ab1423edb.PNG)


</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: bgm.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://bgm.tv/subject/301369](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbgm.tv%2Fsubject%2F301369) ### Comment Username: @xmydl520 > こんにちは。こちらにひとつややこしい問題があります。カスタムルール(ユーザーフィルター)がONであろうかOFFであろうか関係せずブロックが機能しません。全部が全部のサイトにて、すべてのユーザーフィルターが機能しません。色々調べたが解決策が見つかりません。ルーターにAdguard Homeが併用しています。今のうちに唯一の打開策はAdguard Blocker(Adguard Assistantではなく)を同時に稼働すること。こちらのユーザーフィルターに同じルールをインポートしたら問題なく機能します。ちなみにChromeで同じサイトを訪ねたらそちらは問題なく(Adguard Blockerがなくても)ブロックされました。ご迷惑をかけてすみません。 > Hello. There is a complication here. Block does not work regardless of whether the custom rule (user filter) is on or off. It does not work on all sites with any user rule. I also have Adguard Home on my router. The only way to solve it at the moment is to run Adguard Blocker (not Adguard Assistant) at the same time. With importing the same rules into the user filter it works fine. By the way, I visited the same site on Chrome and was blocked without any problem (even without Adguard Blocker). ### Screenshots

issue.title: eksisozluk.com, fixes search-box text ads
issue.body:
"sponsorlu" list items removal and search box placeholder ads text hiding,

tested on Firefox (Windows), Chrome (Windows), Chrome mobile mode via DevTools (Windows)

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
hides/removes search box ads on eksisozluk.com.

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?
Search box ads become hidden and removed.

### Enter the issue address

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located






1. Your comment

They put text ads into search box placeholder. My fix hides it. They add 2 list items (`<li>`) to search results. I removed them from DOM. Also there is a text "sponsorlu" (means sponsored) next to the search box. My fix hides it. 

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846855-e9a25c5c-5af2-4822-bcf4-4a88feaf2eac.PNG)


</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847520-43a5feb5-b0df-4617-b804-6dda6595d9d2.PNG)


</details>
<details>

<summary>Screenshot search results ads (before fix):</summary>

comment.body:
@Alex-302 Their search box ads are for daily basis. They don't have advertisement deal for today on searchbox. 

Their default placeholder on searchbox is `başlık, #entry, @yazar`. If they don't have an ads on that day, search box placeholder shows this text.

You can check this on web.archive.org.

An example for non-ads day:
https://web.archive.org/web/20220425053210/https://eksisozluk.com/

Examples for ads day:
https://web.archive.org/web/20220427090556/https://eksisozluk.com/
https://web.archive.org/web/20220612025329/https://eksisozluk.com/

PS: You have to remove Web Archive top bar (`div#wm-ipp-base`) via DevTools to see the search box.


I couldn't see search results ads on Web Archive, because search results list (`<ul>`, `ul#ui-id-2`) is empty at the start.  They use javascript to populate search results list. However, this rules worked on me at least for 2 ads days. Also you can check this from screenshots.

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

comment.body:
The easiest way to test if it's a scam, would be for a somewhat brave person to connect with `https://ifamily.top/dns-query` in a DNS-over-HTTPS client.

If the connection works, it's not a scam, but is someone's actual AdGuard Home server that they've opened public ports for.

If the connection fails, *then* it could possibly be blocked.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, it can't be handled without using JS.
You can manually add this to the User rules or wait new extension release.
```
cmpv2.standard.co.uk,cmpv2.independent.co.uk#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(window.location.href.includes("consentUUID")){var g=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('.message-component > button[title^="Agree" i]');b&&(g.disconnect(),b.click())});g.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){g.disconnect()},1E4)}}); 
```

It seems that the JS rule does not work on Firefox.
However, comments are loaded after cookies are accepted, so we don't have to fix this by removing the cookie window.
